creator: jmetzner@apache.org
text:
the file cocoon.xconf.ant_patch cannot be deleted on windows because it is locked.
the patch will force the jvm to delete the file when the jvm process is terminating.

Created attachment 15449
patch for src/targets/webapp-build.xml

updated patch to work with the lenya 1.2.3 release
creator: jmetzner@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The temp file is not deleted on exit, but at least the build does not cancel.

Thanks for the patch, I applied it to BRANCH_1_2_X.
It remains to be checked if 1.4 is also affected by this problem, hence I leave
this bug as NEW.
